title: Tower of Strength
marks: Signed, Dated, Numbered, Inscribed LR: each print except title page: T.L. Solien 1982
description: Suite of five drypoints and title page in brown ink on John Koller handmade paper; housed in a beige buckram folding portfolio case and beige buckram slipcase, with relief-printed title design.
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, Gift of The Northern Star Foundation and The Fiduciary Fund
